title: Digital Learning Platform Design Using Gamification and AI-Based Personalized Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with digital learning tools and possession of job-related basic knowledge
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive training program for in-service professionals to strengthen social sector job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain learning design principles utilizing gamification elements (level systems, badges, real-time feedback)
Learners can establish personalized learning path optimization strategies by applying AI-based adaptive learning algorithms
Learners can apply data analysis techniques for measuring learner engagement and performance in digital learning platforms to practical settings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
